MemoryInfobox.description: 'Dolios located Hyrkanos, a dangerous mercenary who was disrupting the Spartan advance in the Megaris|region. He asked Kassandra to deal with the menace before he could do any more damage.'

General_Description: '''Hunting Hyrkanos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On [[Dolios]]' suggestion, Kassandra sought to eliminate the [[Athens|Athenian]]-affiliated [[mercenary]] [[Hyrkanos the Cunning|Hyrkanos]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to [[Megara]]. He found Hyrkanos patrolling the [[Sanctuary of Athena, Megara|Sanctuary of Athena]]. 
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This must be Hyrkanos's camp...''
She travelled to the sanctuary and eliminated Hyrkanos, looting his body.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hmm, this has been quite profitable. Maybe I should hunt down more mercenaries.''
Kassandra returned to Dolios in the [[Occupied Forest of Tripodiskos]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The mercenary Hyrkanos is dead.''
*'''Dolios:''' ''[[Sparta]] thanks you, misthios.''
Dolios walked away.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What about my reward?''
*'''Dolios:''' ''We never entered into a contract. This is something you did yourself... But be assured Sparta is grateful.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Great...''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated Hyrkanos and reported to Dolios about her mission.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
